Cambridge City
MA

Awaiting Report Item
AR-25-26

That the City Manager is requested to confer with the Community Development Department to assemble a list of public and private spaces available to the public, indoors and outdoors, noting contact information and any associated requirements, ensuring that there are public meeting places identified in each neighborhood.

Information

Department:City Manager's OfficeSponsors:Councillor Catherine Zusy, Councillor Paul F. Toner, Mayor E. Denise Simmons, Councillor Patricia Nolan
Category:Awaiting Report

Links
